verbose_text: After 30 min of ischemia and 120 min of reperfusion, cardiac function, infarct size, cardiac marker enzymes, antioxidative parameters, inflammatory factors, histopathological changes, cardiomyocyte apoptosis, and B-cell lymphoma 2 (Bcl-2), Bcl-2-associated X protein and caspase-3 expression were determined using a multi-channel physiological recording system, nitrotetrazolium blue chloride, biochemical kits, radioimmunoassay kits, hematoxylin and eosin, terminal deoxynucleotidyl-transferase-mediated dUTP nick end labeling assay, immunohistochemistry and reverse transcription-quantitative PCR, respectively.
